title: 1 bed/1 bath apartment right across the street of Douglas Park!
posting_body: Beautifully renovated large 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment in Chicago's Little Village/Pilsen neighborhood.
The apartment features an open floor plan, beautiful hardwood floors and an updated bathroom.
Steps from California Pink Line stop and the 21 Cermak bus.

a few minutee walk to Sip 22 Coffee Lounge, Maria Saucedo Academy, Farragut Academy, Little Village Branch Public Library; short walk to Pete's Fresh Market, Douglas Park (Riot Fest), Mt. Sinai and Saint Anthony Hospitals.
Short L ride to Rush/UIC Medical District and University of Illinois at Chicago.
Building is professionally managed and secure.
Free laundry available in the building.
Pets up to 35LB are welcomed ,no aggressive breeds please
All well qualified tenants must have:
-Net income must be at least 2.5 times the rent combined together
Initial payment of the first months rent and $325 administrative move-in fee are required prior to lease signing.
For more information or to schedule a showing please contact our leasing agent Lucy via text message at 773 877 9647 or email
